# ArcJS

## contribution guide

```bash
# clone arcjs repo
git clone https://github.com/zedlab/arcjs.git
# install deps
npm install
# run test
npm test
# link this module
npm link

# clone hapi-arc repo
git clone https://github.com/zedlab/hapi-arc.git
# use linked arcjs module
npm link arc.js
# install deps
npm install
# link this module
npm link

# clone hapi-arc-example repo
git clone https://github.com/zedlab/hapi-arc-example.git
# use linked hapi-arc module
npm link hapi-arc
# install deps
npm install
# run the example
node index.js
```
